name: home-page
description: The personal and professional home page of Jayson Virissimo

scripts.build-html-resume: echo 'Exporting to HTML...' && cd src/documents && resume export resume.html --format html --theme spartan
scripts.build-pdf-resume: echo 'Exporting to PDF...' && cd src/documents; resume export resume.pdf --theme ../../node_modules/jsonresume-theme-spartan
scripts.build-resumes: npm run validate && npm run build-html-resume && npm run build-pdf-resume
scripts.deploy: npm run test && git subtree push --prefix src origin master
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating resume.json...' && cd src/documents && resume validate && echo 'Validated!'

author: Jayson Virissimo <jayson.virissimo@asu.edu>
